name: Elemental Resonance: Soothing Water
description:
Heal your active character for 2 HP and all your characters on standby for 1 HP.
(You must have at least 2 Hydro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw: Heal your active character for 2 HP and all your characters on standby for 1 HP.\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
